name: CopyCat
tagline: Build browser automations with AI
description: CopyCat is a no-code platform for building browser automations. Using the CopyCat editor, you can automate any web task by combining AI prompts with reliable step-by-step actions.

name: Doco
tagline: Cursor for Microsoft Word
description: Doco is an AI writing assistant built natively into Microsoft Word. It combines the power of Grammarly, Cursor, and Co-Pilot‚Äîoptimized for structured document workflows. Reference any file, create custom projects and workflows - all without leaving Word.

name: Nitrode
tagline: AI game engine to prototype 3D games in a day
description: Nitrode is an AI game engine that empowers devs to vibe code a playable 3D game in a matter of hours. Build the game you‚Äôve always dreamed of but never got the chance to.

name: Unitree R1
tagline: Ultra-lightweight humanoid robot starting at $5900
description: Unitree R1 is an ultra-lightweight, fully customizable humanoid robot for education, research, and industry. Features advanced power systems, flexible joints, modular design, and secondary development support.

name: Ahey
tagline: A free and open-source, embeddable video conference app.
description: A frictionless, peer-to-peer video conferencing app for the web that can be embedded in any webpage. No sign-ups, no downloads, no limits, 100% free and ready to use instantly.

name: Singify AI Vocal Remover
tagline: Remove vocals from any song
description: Singify AI Vocal Remover uses advanced 10-stem separation to isolate vocals, drums, bass, piano, guitar, and more. Fast, free, and easy to use, it delivers high-quality results with minimal artifacts‚Äîperfect for creators, remixers, and music lovers.

name: Chive
tagline: The macOS companion for Claude Code
description: Never lose track of Claude Code again. Chive helps you juggle multiple Claude Code instances, showing which are busy, waiting, or need your attention.

name: Guidey
tagline: Add modern onboarding tours to your product in minutes
description: Guidey is the fastest way to create interactive tours and onboarding flows for your SaaS ‚Äî no code needed. Boost activation, cut support requests, and guide users straight to the ‚Äúaha!‚Äù moment.

name: Aeneas
tagline: AI that helps historians connect the past
description: Aeneas is a new open-source AI model from Google DeepMind that helps historians restore, date, and place fragmentary ancient inscriptions. It analyzes both text and images to provide new context on ancient texts.

name: Web
tagline: A free macOS AI browser
description: Web is built natively with SwiftUI to delivers a minimal, progressive browsing experience with integrated AI capabilities.

name: Best Reminder App Chrome Extension
tagline: Cloud Sync: Reminders across devices, plus email alerts.
description: Introducing optional Cloud Sync that backs up active reminders and syncs across devices (with local‚Äëfirst offline support), plus email reminders that deliver notifications even when your device is closed. Frequent alerts are bundled into a daily summary.

name: GPTFunnels
tagline: Cursor x ClickFunnels for vibe funneling
description: GPT Funnels is an AI powered no-code funnel builder for solopreneurs, marketers & lean teams. Turn content into high-converting funnels + automate copy, design & optimization with AI agents that think like a full stack growth team. We call it Vibe Funneling!

name: TrackdIn
tagline: LinkedIn Chrome Extension That Actually Helps You Grow
description: TrackdIn is your free Chrome extension to analyze LinkedIn posts, break down performance, and get AI-powered tips on what to post next. No scraping. Just clear comparisons, growth insights, and smarter content ideas for everyone.

name: Link
tagline: Your AI Real Estate Copilot
description: Link is a conversational AI that lets you search properties, compare neighborhoods, and calculate market value ‚Äî all in real time, for free. [Create your account by August 8 to unlock up to $20K in buyers credits] - Terms on our website

name: Wordwriter Deep Research and Book Agent
tagline: Write 200+ Pages of Research & Books with References
description: Create detailed research and well-structured mini books in one place. Just give your topic, and let the AI handle the research, writing, and proper referencing.

name: WiredSign.com
tagline: Send. Sign. Done. - Smart contracts. No legal headaches.
description: WiredSign lets you send and sign legally binding contracts without logins, downloads, or delays. Perfect for teams, freelancers, and anyone tired of chasing signatures.

name: Mimirly
tagline: Explore your future, one choice at a time
description: Mimirly is your wise, AI-powered guide for life‚Äôs big decisions. Explore interactive scenarios, see how choices impact your future, and get smart insights tailored to your personality, goals, and values. It‚Äôs like life‚Äîbut with a reset button.

name: StartupSonar - Your Idea Sonarr
tagline: Detect hidden startup opportunities from Reddit discussions
description: StartupSonar analyzes Reddit discussions 24/7 to find hidden business opportunities. Built in 48 hours using AI, it turns social conversations into actionable startup ideas with market analysis, viability scores, and implementation roadmaps.

name: B2B Vault - Get Better At B2B Marketing
tagline: Free AI Growth Consultant Trained on Brains from 70+ Experts
description: Sick of AI-generated content and bad advice on LinkedIn and Google? B2B Vault filters the noise. Get real insights from top B2B minds & use AI marketing assistant trained on their secret knowledge. It‚Äôs like hiring 100 B2B experts to work for you. But free.
